key.name: hot-corner-on-right
key.summary: Set the left/right position of the hot corner for the window picker
key.description: Default position of the hot corner is in a right corner. Set false to move the hot corner to a left corner. The position is not affected by the RTL vs. LTR text direction.

key.name: hot-corner-on-bottom
key.summary: Set the top/bottom position of the hot corner for the window picker
key.description: Default position of the hot corner is in a bottom corner. Set false to move the hot corner to a top corner.

key.name: hot-corner-size
key.summary: Set the size of the hot corner target
key.description: Number of pixels in one dimension of the square target for the hot corner. Default is for a single pixel in the very corner. For some virtual machines, this value may need to be set larger than the default.
